definition: to ask for help/to ask a favor/to recruit talented people
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
if you want sth done well, do it yourself (idiom)
pinyin: qiu2 ren2 bu4 ru2 qiu2 ji3

sentences.english: I'll find the people to help do it.
sentences.chinese: 求人帮忙实在叫他难于启齿。

sentences.english: Catherine, you have always asked too little.
sentences.chinese: 凯瑟琳，你总是不求人啊。

sentences.english: Can you send us a catalog of your products for reference in five days?
sentences.chinese: 请答贱方可否正在五夜外寄入产品纲录求人方参考？

sentences.english: Presumably laic it is laic, because like ask for help when anything crops up, the likelihood is.
sentences.chinese: 想来凡人之所以为凡人，可能就是因为遇事喜欢求人。

sentences.english: The butcher was furious that the cow had tried to beg for its life.
sentences.chinese: 屠夫因为老牛曾经求人饶命而勃然大怒。

sentences.english: I hate asking favors of people.
sentences.chinese: 你想帮他个忙，他却说，他不喜欢求人。

sentences.english: Consider pleading and imploringpeople into the faith.
I hate asking some favours of people .
The Admiral hates trouble, and scorns asking favours;
sentences.chinese: 海军将军怕麻烦，不屑于求人。

sentences.english: Remember, you're the one asking for something.
sentences.chinese: 记住，你是那个求人办事的人。

sentences.english: For once, Mr Brown was asking for support.
sentences.chinese: 只有这一次，布朗先生开口求人了。

definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
if you want sth done well, do it yourself (idiom)
pinyin: qiu2 ren2 bu4 ru2 qiu2 ji3

definition: to look displeased/to not be afraid of hurting sb's feelings/to put aside one's pride
lit. to beg grandpa and call on grandma (idiom)/fig. to go about begging for help
pinyin: qiu2 ye2 ye5 gao4 nai3 nai5

definition: to make friends/(dialect) to start an affair with sb
to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety
to give in charity/to give alms (to the poor)
